text:
THANKS! Linda 

My story is a little different.  I booked a room. There was a mistake within the booking system. 

Linda became aware she had been double booked.  As rare as that is she handled it like a champ. Helping me, a rookie at airbnb , find a place to stay. 

Can't wait to visit Austin again and make sure I get to meet this angel.
title: Austin House for special events
